Giganci przestworzy
Giganten der Lüfte
Giganten in de lucht
Gigantes de los aires
Giganti dell_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; aria
Vzducholodě
boardgame.description: Description from publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;By cleverly combining the three colored dice with the values on the cards, you take part in building zeppelins and finally the famous Hindenburg._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;egrave; from spielbox.de:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Giganten der L_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;fte (working-title _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Zeppelin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) is a very tactical dice-game. You need mechanics, engines, and workshops.... Only the player with the best combination of those will successfully take part in building the Hindenburg._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Giganten der L_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;fte is not comparable to Lucky Loop or Alhambra - the dice game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It is comparable to games like Kingsburg and To Court the King, where you use the dice as a form of resources to manage, as well as a method of purchasing other resources._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Artwork by Jo Hartwig._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Microbadges: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2008 Golden Geek Best Family Board Game Nominee

Rio Grande Games (RIO A01) Number of players: 2-4 Age of players: 10++ Length: 45-60 minutes Game Description: These airships are majestic as they rise to the heavens. It took a long time before the work on these giants could begin. Engineers had to be employed, a hangar built, materials procured and sponsors found. At last the day has arrived and a giant airship starts its maiden flight towards the horizon. In this exciting game the players use their skill to try to expand their own companies. In the end they will have created an impressive fleet of airships. Author: Andreas Seyfarth

RESERVED FOR AUCTION WINNER CLARKKENT22 Multilingual edition. Played a couple times. Great condition. Also in this listing are two other games: 2)Cleopatra_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Caboose--New in shrink 3) Mob Ties Kickstarter edition--This is a special kickstarter edition. There were 26 copies of Mob Ties that were packaged in a theme box/container of some kind. According to the Kickstarter page, it could have been a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; briefcase, torturer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s bag, a dirty cop_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s gym bag, etc_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Well, mine came in a hollowed out book. Pretty cool. The main board locations were cut up and put in the book. The money, cards, chits, etc all fit in the book. The instruction manuals did not, however. The player aids were also in the book, but they just barely fit, so I took them out. Also, the plastic stands that were in the standard version were not in this version. I never contacted Hostage Entertainment about this. Photos can be found in my gallery.

This sale has been auto-generated for the auction: [geekurl=/geeklist/241960/item/6238654#6238654]Item for Geeklist _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Gencon Virtual Flea Market 2018_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; [/geekurl] Please do not purchase if you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t win this auction. Reserved for jeremylguntner for pickup at Gen Con Please submit payment via PayPal, Google Wallet or Venmo to gramaw@gmail.com. Alternatively, you may pay, via one of these methods or COD, directly at the convention. Since I am selling so many games I plan to meet as many buyers as possible on Saturday morning at 9AM outside of hall A on level 1 of the convention center, near room 128 (this was the former location of multiple Gen Con Math trade meetups, in case you are familiar.) You can find a link to a map of the denoted area here: https://boardgamegeek.com/image/4236187/gramaw If at all possible please meet me at this time and location. If this will not be possible, please Geekmail me so we can make an alternative arrangement. Lastly, my phone number is 847.454.6369 if you need to reach me at the convention.

Description from publisher: By cleverly combining the three colored dice with the values on the cards, you take part in building zeppelins and finally the famous Hindenburg. Renè from spielbox.de: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Giganten der Lüfte (working-title _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Zeppelin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) is a very tactical dice-game. You need mechanics, engines, and workshops.... Only the player with the best combination of those will successfully take part in building the Hindenburg._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Giganten der Lüfte is not comparable to Lucky Loop or Alhambra - the dice game. It is comparable to games like Kingsburg and To Court the King, where you use the dice as a form of resources to manage, as well as a method of purchasing other resources.
